remarks: Value of the scalar multiplication function in a binary structure product.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Aug-2015.)
statement:
xpssca.t $e |- T = ( R Xs. S ) $.
xpssca.g $e |- G = ( Scalar ` R ) $.
xpssca.1 $e |- ( ph -> R e. V ) $.
xpssca.2 $e |- ( ph -> S e. W ) $.
xpsvsca.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
xpsvsca.y $e |- Y = ( Base ` S ) $.
xpsvsca.k $e |- K = ( Base ` G ) $.
xpsvsca.m $e |- .x. = ( .s ` R ) $.
xpsvsca.n $e |- .X. = ( .s ` S ) $.
xpsvsca.p $e |- .xb = ( .s ` T ) $.
xpsvsca.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. K ) $.
xpsvsca.4 $e |- ( ph -> B e. X ) $.
xpsvsca.5 $e |- ( ph -> C e. Y ) $.
xpsvsca.6 $e |- ( ph -> ( A .x. B ) e. X ) $.
xpsvsca.7 $e |- ( ph -> ( A .X. C ) e. Y ) $.
xpsvsca $p |- ( ph -> ( A .xb <. B , C >. ) = <. ( A .x. B ) , ( A .X. C ) >. ) $.
